Name: Amending the New York State Alcoholic Beverage Control Law. (S. 3836/A. 7457)
Title: Resolution calling on the New York State Legislature to pass, and the Governor to sign, S. 3836/A. 7457, in relation to amending the New York State Alcoholic Beverage Control Law to permit liquor stores to sell non-alcoholic versions of beer, wine, and spirits
BodyName: Committee on Consumer and Worker Protection

History.Description: This Resolution was Introduced by Council
